word_mean: 隆凸，凸：指一种突起或凸出物，用来命名特殊的解剖结构，见prominentia项下

sentence.Network_en: Crime prevention had to be given more prominence.
sentence.Network_cn: 防止犯罪方面应当受到更多的重视。

sentence.Network_en: a young actor who has recently risen to prominence
sentence.Network_cn: 最近崭露头角的一名年轻演员

sentence.Network_en: An item of prominence on the conference agenda was infant health care.
sentence.Network_cn: 会议议程上的一项重要议题是婴儿保健.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting something that juts out): from obsolete French, from Latin prominentia 'jutting out', from the verb prominere (see prominent)

entry.def: If someone or something is in a position of prominence, they are well-known and important.

example.ex: He came to prominence during the World Cup in Italy...
example.tran: 他在意大利的世界杯赛中声名鹊起。

example.ex: Crime prevention had to be given more prominence.
example.tran: 防止犯罪方面应当受到更多的重视。

means.word_mean: 1. the state of being prominent: widely known or eminent
3. something that bulges out or is protuberant or projects from a form

auth_sentence.content: But his prominence this time makes the strategy irresistible.
auth_sentence.res_content: But his prominence this time makes the strategy irresistible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But his prominence this time makes the strategy irresistible.

auth_sentence.content: Through a syndicated column...Rowan gained a national prominence.
auth_sentence.res_content: Through a syndicated column...Rowan gained a national prominence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Through a syndicated column...Rowan gained a national prominence.

auth_sentence.content: The greater prominence for audio and video got mixed reviews.
auth_sentence.res_content: The greater prominence for audio and video got mixed reviews.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The greater prominence for audio and video got mixed reviews.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 显赫的;杰出的;有名的;优良的
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+min伸出,突出+ent……的→adj.显赫的;杰出的;有名的;优良的
im进入+min伸出,突出+ent……的→伸进来的→即将发生的
pro向前+min伸+ent……的→向前伸出→杰出的
pre前+eminent突出的→向前突出的→杰出的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 用草写小字写的, 极小的
stems_affixes.word_buile: min小+uscule表形容词或名词→小的→极小的

Sentence.sentence: Some hoped his rise to prominence would have a big impact on white Americans, too, challenging those who still harbour racist sentiments.

means.word_mean: 声望, 杰出, 卓越, 出名

sentences.en: The lawyer reached a position of prominence in her profession at an early age.
sentences.cn: 那律师在她年轻的时候就在业内赫赫有名了。

sentences.en: An item of prominence on the conference agenda was infant health care.
sentences.cn: 会议议程上的一项重要议题是婴儿保健。
